mapper.insert: insert into iov_data_dictionary (dict_id, remark, dict_name, dict_code, int_code, parent, dict_sort, create_time, modify_time, delete_status) values (#{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update iov_data_dictionary set remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_name = #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_code = #{dictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, int_code = #{intCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent = #{parent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_sort = #{dictSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_status = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT} where dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select dict_id, remark, dict_name, dict_code, int_code, parent, dict_sort, create_time, modify_time, delete_status from iov_data_dictionary where dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select dict_id, remark, dict_name, dict_code, int_code, parent, dict_sort, create_time, modify_time, delete_status from iov_data_dictionary
